description: This file implements the basic container functions for the Sys Repository Record Object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization. It defines the lifecycle and setup of a repository record object within a system environment.

classes.name: SYS_REPOSITORY_RECORD_OBJECT
classes.description: A structure representing the Sys Repository Record object, including member variables for object configuration and functions for object management.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SysRroCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Sys Repository Record Object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRroRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the specified Sys Repository Record Object, freeing associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRroEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls all required child objects for the record object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SysRroInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the member variables and function pointers of the record object.
